string.name: register_yourself
string.u: Don\'t have an account? Sign Up now

resources.string: Enter your registered mobile number and email below:
An OTP has been sent to your registered email address which will be valid for 24 hours. Enter the received OTP below:
You have no Favourites yet. Explore and add them to your list!
You have not ordered anything yet. Explore and order now!
Ans. We are a Food Ordering app which lets you select your favourite restaurant and we will get it delivered to you.
Q. How does Food Hub work?
Q. When Can I expect my food?
Ans. The speedy delivery of your food is our utmost priority and you can expect your order to arrive within 30 minutes.
Q. Can I order from two different restaurant at the same time?
Ans. No, you cannot. But you can easily place two or more orders one after another
Q. Nothing is showing in my suburb, or is my favourite restaurant not listed?

Ans. We try our best to get your local gems on Food Hub. But your locality is quite a pretty big place! If we missed anything, you can let us know by contacting the developer of the app and we\'ll try and get them on board.
Q. How do I register myself in the app?
Ans. Well, that\'s easy. Just enter your name, phone number, active email address, your delivery address and create a password. And you are registered!
Q. I have forgotten my password. What should I do now?

Ans. No worries. You can easily go to the \"Forgot password\" link present on the login page, enter your registered email address and mobile number. You will get an OTP in your email address which will be valid for 24 hours. Just type in the OTP, type your new password and there you go. You password has been reset.
